item.title: About
item.description: Kia ora! This is my humble page, currently I work as a Technical Architect in New Zealand. Lately most of my interests have been aligned around: Enterprise/business architecture Data and analytics Cloud strategy and adoption Mathematics and statistics Infrastructure C#/JS/scripting and outside of technology: Philosophy Cosmology Kettlebells Martial arts/self defense Jazz Feel free to reach out if I may be able to assist at all. Note any opinions here are mine alone and may not represent my employers.

item.title: Blogging
item.description: I’ve been wanting to write more :clap: :collision:
